title: What are Non-pharmaceutical Interventions
description: They are structured interventions that are adjusted to the cognitive level of the patients and in conjunction with the pharmaceutical treatment help the patient to remain functional and active, mentally and socially, for a longer period of time. They include a wide variety of activities. The main Non-pharmaceutical interventions are:
bottom_text: The diAnoia app provides daily ideas for Cognitive Reinforcement but also everyday entertaining and creative activities.
